name: math-agent-studio
description: Transform math textbook chapter PDFs into 5 comprehensive study materials: notes, problems, answers, explanations, and YouTube scripts

skills.name: process-textbook
skills.description: Process a math textbook chapter PDF into 5 comprehensive study materials

agents.name: workflow-orchestrator
agents.description: Orchestrates the sequential workflow for generating all 5 output types

agents.name: notes-generator
agents.description: Generates comprehensive study notes (Step 1) with concepts, examples, and mnemonics

agents.name: problems-generator
agents.description: Generates 10 practice problems (Step 2a) with standard and competition-level questions

agents.name: answers-generator
agents.description: Generates quick answer key (Step 2b) in compact table format

agents.name: explanations-generator
agents.description: Generates detailed explanations (Step 2c) with multiple solution approaches
